I'm not much of a hockey fan, but I'm impressed with the way the Buffalo Sabres have been playing this year. Ryan Miller is out for six weeks with a busted thumb, so our goaltending won't have as much depth. Your take on your favorite teams, picks for the next game, etc.
 BTW; Home-and-home series between Buffalo and Montreal. Split series with Buffalo taking the second game.

Kansas City needs a Hockey Team.emoticon_mad 
 We used to have the Blades but they were an IHL team. The IHL doesn't exist anymore. However, I have heard rumors that we were going to be getting one. At one time, I heard the Ducks from Anaheim, California were going to be coming to KC. But as of yet, we have nothing. And I don't really see us getting one for some time yet.
What's up with the Sabres this year? In the last 20 games they won 17 of them. They're playing very well.
Although the Sabres lost 3-4 in a shootout against the Carolina Hurricaines, they still gained another point and are just two points behind the Ottawa Senators. emoticon_xgood

WE OWN YOU!!!!emoticon_xgood emoticon_xgood 
 The Buffalo Sabres have been mopping up the ice with the Bruins, winning the last six games against Bahhston.:xbanghead
